channel.title: Comments on: How to Detect Scam

item.title: By: Jack Steeve
item.dc:creator: Jack Steeve
item.description: Thanks a lot for the info. How about viruses and malware? How do they work? And how should we protect ourselves?
item.content:encoded: Thanks a lot for the info. How about viruses and malware? How do they work? And how should we protect ourselves?

item.title: By: Abdul
item.dc:creator: Abdul
item.description: Scammers in the cryptosphere are way too much to be handled, thanks for sharing, will try to mend my ways and stay safu
item.content:encoded: Scammers in the cryptosphere are way too much to be handled, thanks for sharing, will try to mend my ways and stay safu❤

item.title: By: Michael Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael Michael
item.description: Quite interesting tips. I am now fully armed with adequate information to protect myself from crypto scams.
item.content:encoded: Quite interesting tips. I am now fully armed with adequate information to protect myself from crypto scams.

item.title: By: Steven
item.dc:creator: Steven
item.description: This is really helpful ????. Now, scammers won't be able to rip me off.
item.content:encoded: This is really helpful ????. Now, scammers won’t be able to rip me off.
